problem_text_cn: 如图,△ABC内接于⊙O,∠OAB=45°,则∠ACB的度数为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, △ABC is inscribed in ⊙O, ∠OAB = N_0, then the degree of ∠ACB is ()
raw_answer:
解:连接OB,在圆周上取一点D,连接AD,BD,∵OA=OB,∠OAB=45°,∴∠OBA=∠OAB=45°,∴∠AOB=90°,∴∠ADB=45°,∴∠ACB=180°-∠ADB=135°,
故选:A．
raw_comment: 此题考查了圆周角定理以及等腰三角形的性质．此题难度不大,注意掌握数形结合思想的应用．
